jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Supervises, directs, and reviews the work of the Accounting team members
  • Review day-to-day journal entries and ensure posted journal entries are complete and accurate
  • Responsible for accounting, bookkeeping and administration in daily basis and timely financial closing in monthly basis
  • Monitor accounts receivables aging and liquidity
  • Ensure completeness of accruals and provision on monthly closing
  • Prepare reporting package and supporting details needed for Group consolidation process
  • Produce financial statements or other supporting financial reports as required by management
  • Assess and identify financial and accounting policies and procedures towards overall business process improvement
  • Maintain and ensure commercial terms of commercial deals align with accounting standards
  • Perform budgeting preparation and performance analytics of monthly financial results
  • Monitor and control the costs and expenses disbursement and provide recommendations to increase cost efficiency and effectiveness
  • Contribute to continuous improvement of processes by setting up accounting guidance and policy
  • Participate in ad-hoc projects

• Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor's Degree, Accountancy or equivalent
  • At least 5-7 year(s) of relevant cumulative working experience in accounting role (preferably in financial services entities) is required for this position, prior experience in Big 4 is an advantage
  • Applicants must be willing to work in Jakarta Selatan
  • Computer literacy and ability to manipulate large amounts of data, simply excel wizard
  • Prior exposure to software such as SAP and Oracle
  • Proven knowledge of accounting principles, practices, standards, laws and regulations
  • Ability to work independently under general guidance and with self-initiative
  • Strong sense of ownership
  • Excellent interpersonal skills, attention to detail, organized and thorough with the desire for continuous improvement
  • Ability to meet assigned deadlines, with excellent verbal and written communication and analytical skills
  • Ability to act and operate independently with minimal daily direction to accomplish assigned tasks
  • Demonstrates effective leadership, motivation, and team work in a dynamic, multi-cultural business environment
  • Demonstrates exceptional planning, interpersonal and communication skills
  • Ability to work cooperatively and collaboratively with all levels of employees, management, and external agencies to maximize performance, creativity, problem solving, and results
  • Ability to handle multiple tasks and changing priorities in a fast-paced environment
